content: In the past, we've solicited feedback on open issues here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Specification_Feedback_(DSTU_2)
we got one piece of feedback. yay!
everything else went straight to gForge. So in STU3, we should solicit feedback to gForge. opinions?
Where and why did we seek feedback on the wiki? I believe it was the intention for all feedback to go to gForge, wasn't it?
if you go to the search page, and look for "DSTU Note" you'll see the where. There's about 10 of those
